Bash(raster" errors when the QGIS project uses a different CRS than the
   raster \(e.g. EPSG:2948 canvas vs EPSG:32619 raster\). Now all click
   coordinates are transformed to raster CRS before bounds checks, tile
   lookup, and point-to-pixel conversion. Mask geometries are transformed
   back to canvas CRS for rubberband display.

2. CUDA upgrade: pip silently skipped CUDA torch installation when a
   higher-versioned CPU torch was already in the venv \(e.g. 2.10.0+cpu
   vs 2.5.1+cu121 on the CUDA index\). Now detects CPU torch and
   uninstalls it before installing from the CUDA index. Also adds
   versioned cuda_fallback tracking so users stuck on CPU due to this
   bug get an automatic retry on plugin update, without affecting users
   whose setup already works.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
